txt.en: You cannot use stealth while carrying an artifact.
You are immune to all negative combat states while carrying an artifact.
Carrying a relic this powerful increases your defences and speed. Cannot stealth while carrying a relic.
You cannot utilize any form of speed increasing abilities while carrying a relic.
While carrying an artifact you cannot use skills with an induction or channel.\n
-[placeholder] Incoming Melee, Ranged, and Tactical damage.
